title: I Became A Member Of The Royal Family For 43 Minutes
description: In this video, Max Fosh pretends to be a member of the royal family for 43 minutes, attending a royal event and interacting with actual members of the royal family.
summary: Max Fosh pretends to be a member of the royal family for a short period of time, experiencing what it's like to be treated as royalty.
payoff: The payoff comes when the real members of the royal family interact with Max, who is pretending to be one of them. The humor comes from the reactions of both Max and the actual royals in this unique and absurd situation.
